caption.p: Clinical trials/studies in progression on using chloroquine (CQ) or hydroxychloroquine (HCQ) as antiviral agents

Chloroquine prevention of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in the healthcare setting
Treatment of mild cases and chemoprophylaxis of contacts as prevention of the COVID-19 epidemic

New treatment for radical cure of dengue fever with antiviral and anti-cytokine
A prospective, open label, randomized, control trial for chloroquine or hydroxychloroquine in patients with mild and common novel coronavirus pulmonary (COVID-19)
A prospective, randomized, open-label, controlled trial for chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine in patients with severe novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19)

Evaluation the efficacy and safety of hydroxychloroquine sulfate in comparison with phosphate chloroquine in severe patients with novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19): a randomized, open-label, parallel, controlled trial
A prospective, randomized, open-label, controlled clinical study to evaluate the preventive effect of hydroxychloroquine on close contacts after exposure to the novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19)
A multicenter, single-blind, randomized controlled clinical trial for chloroquine phosphate in the treatment of novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19)

Randomized controlled trial for chloroquine phosphate in the treatment of novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19)
Clinical study of chloroquine phosphate in the treatment of severe novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19)
Single arm study for exploration of chloroquine phosphate aerosol inhalation in the treatment of novel coronavirus pneumonia (COVID-19)
A single-blind, randomized, controlled clinical trial for chloroquine phosphate in the treatment of novel coronavirus pneumonia 2019 (COVID-19)
A single-arm clinical trial for chloroquine phosphate in the treatment of novel coronavirus pneumonia 2019 (COVID-19)
Efficacy of chloroquine and lopinavir/ritonavir in mild/general novel coronavirus (CoVID-19) infections: a prospective, open-label, multicenter randomized controlled clinical study

fn.label: a
fn.p: The names were extracted as they appeared on relevant databases without any language corrections.
